name: JUnit
tagline: JUnit - the programmer-oriented testing framework for Java.
body:
### JUnit 4

JUnit 4 is the current stable version of JUnit. For more information, please visit the [JUnit 4 website](http://junit.org/junit4).

### JUnit 5

JUnit 5 is the next generation of JUnit. The goal is to create an up-to-date foundation for developer-side testing on the JVM. This includes focusing on Java 8 and above, as well as enabling many different styles of testing. For more information, please refer to the [User Guide](https://junit-team.github.io/junit5/) or the [Source Code on GitHub](https://github.com/junit-team/junit5).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
